A: Section A: Objective Questions
1. The long hand on a clock is called the _ hand (a) hour (b) minute (c) second)
2. The short hand on a clock is called the _ hand (a) minute (b) hour (c) long)
3. A clock face shows _ hour clock times (a) 6 (b) 12 (c) 24)
4. The minute hand tells the number of _ (a) hours (b) minutes (c) seconds)
5. The hour hand tells the number of _ (a) minutes (b) seconds (c) hours)
6. 4 o'clock refers to a time shown on an _ clock (a) digital (b) analogue (c) future)
7. 8 o'clock is an example of _ time (a) digital (b) past (c) analogue)
8. 5:00 is read as five _ (a) o'clock (b) half past (c) minutes)
9. 5:30 is read as half past _ (a) four (b) five (c) six)
10. Digital time for half past 5 is _ (a) 5:00 (b) 5:30 (c) 6:00)
11. Analogue time for 5:00 is _ (a) half past five (b) five o'clock (c) five thirty)
12. How many numbers are typically on a standard clock face (a) 10 (b) 12 (c) 60)
13. The minute hand moves one full circle in _ hour (a) one (b) two (c) twelve)
14. There are _ minutes in an hour (a) 30 (b) 60 (c) 12)
15. When the minute hand points to 12, it is an _ o'clock (a) half past (b) quarter past (c) exact)
16. If the hour hand is on 3 and the minute hand is on 12, the time is _ o'clock (a) three (b) twelve (c) nine)
17. What type of time uses hands to show time (a) Digital (b) Analogue (c) Future)
18. What type of time uses numbers to show time (a) Analogue (b) Past (c) Digital)
19. 30 minutes past an hour is called _ past the hour (a) quarter (b) half (c) full)
20. The smallest unit of time on a clock usually shown by a hand is the _ (a) hour (b) minute (c) second)
B: 1. What is the long hand on a clock called? _________
2. What is the short hand on a clock called? _________
3. How many hours does a clock face typically show? _________
5. What is half past 5 in digital time? _________
C: 1. State the function of the minute hand on a clock.
2. State the function of the hour hand on a clock.
3. Distinguish between analogue and digital time.
4. Provide an example of an analogue time as mentioned in the text.
5. Provide an example of a digital time as mentioned in the text.
answers_C: It tells the number of minutes past or to the hour.
Analogue time uses hands; digital time uses numbers.
